title: MD
biography: Robert Huber is a German biochemist and Nobel laureate. known for his work crystallizing an intramembrane protein important in photosynthesis and subsequently applying X-ray crystallography to elucidate the protein's structure.
aiSummary: Robert Huber is a structural biology specialist with an H-index of 147 at Max Planck Institute (Member). Has been published in Nature, Science, Nature Reviews Molecular Cell Biology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
